tool_description: You can get every bit of details of a user location by only giving their IP address.
name: IP Info
title: IP Info

api_list.name: IPInfo Location API
api_list.description: You can use this Endpoint to extract users location details by giving their IP address to the parameter.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-info5.p.rapidapi.com/api/info/192.0.2.146"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-info5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-info5.p.rapidapi.com/api/info/{ip}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-info5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
